channel.title: Outer Banks on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Outer Banks on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How ‘The Runarounds’ Wove Its Meta Tale About the Making of a Modern Rock Band
item.description: Jonas Pate shares a five-season plan as the creator and his team talk with THR about how the Prime Video series subverts the traditions of Hollywood music dramas.

item.title: How ‘The Runarounds’ Wove Its Meta Tale About the Making of a Modern Rock Band
item.description: Jonas Pate shares a five-season plan as the creator and his team talk with THR about how the Prime Video series subverts the traditions of Hollywood music dramas.

item.title: ‘The Runarounds’ Trailer: Real Life Musicians-Turned-Actors Chase Love and Fame
item.description: The ‘Outer Banks’ creators tapped William Lipton, Axel Ellis, Jeremy Yun, Zendé Murdock and Jesse Golliher to form a teenage rock band, and then let the cameras roll.

item.title: ‘The Runarounds’ Trailer: Real Life Musicians-Turned-Actors Chase Love and Fame
item.description: The ‘Outer Banks’ creators tapped William Lipton, Axel Ellis, Jeremy Yun, Zendé Murdock and Jesse Golliher to form a teenage rock band, and then let the cameras roll.

item.title: Madelyn Cline Reveals the Last-Minute Changes to ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’
item.description: In a spoiler-filled chat, the star breaks down the twists and turns she didn’t know about until two weeks before the movie started screening for press.

item.title: Madelyn Cline Reveals the Last-Minute Changes to ‘I Know What You Did Last Summer’

item.title: 30 Bingeworthy Young Adult Films and TV Shows Released in Recent Years
item.description: ‘The Summer I Turned Pretty,’ ‘Never Have I Ever,’ ‘We Were Liars,’ ‘Elite’ and ‘My Fault: London’ are among popular projects that recently hit screens.
